content:
Hi,
i'm searching for a HL7 V3 CDA US Specification for Immunization Records. I could not find anything on the HL7.org website.
I could only find these CDA V2 Implementation Guides: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/programs/iis/technical-guidance/hl7.html
Can someone tell me if a CDA version exists or is planned?
Many thanks in advance!
